1.description: Use for separator lines on layer 1 (no contrast requriements)

2.description: Use for soft borders on default page bg

default.description: Use for default text color in inputs

placeholder.description: Use for placeholder text in fields

default.description: Use for input borders (AA contrast compliant on app bg)

inverse.description: Use as component background in high-contrast situations.

background.description: Use for the pseudo terminal window background color.

primary.description: Use for monotype output in an invere layer.

secondary.description: Use for timestamp or secondary monotype output in an inverse layer.

inverse.description: Use for primary text on an inverse layer

inverse-secondary.description: Use for secondary text on an inverse layer.

error.description: Use for error text/icons outside of notices.

success.description: Use for success text/icons outisde of notices.

background.description: The background color for the top toolbar

default.description: Default text color for the top toolbar's contents
